content: IBM system Service Representative at installation time.  If DPM is enabled, the IBM z16 system cannot run z/OS, IBM z/VSE, and z/TPF LPARs. © Copyright IBM Corp. 2022. All rights reserved. 453 Chapter 11. Environmental requirements This chapter describes the environmental requirements for IBM z16 servers. It also lists the dimensions, weights, power, and cooling requirements that are needed to plan for the installation of an IBM z16. This chapter includes the following topics:  11.1, “Introduction” on page 454  11.3, “Physical specifications” on page 463  11.4, “Physical planning” on page 464  11.5, “Energy management” on page 468 11 Naming: Throughout this chapter, IBM z16 refers to IBM z16 Model A01 (Machine Type 3931), unless otherwise specified. 454 IBM z16 (3931) Technical Guide 11.1 Introduction The following options are available for physically installing the server:  Air or water cooling  Power Distribution Unit (PDU) or Bulk Power Assembly (BPA) for power  On a raised
